emails.subject: Project Update - Q1 Hackathon
emails.snippet: Hi team, I wanted to share an update on our Q1 hackathon progress. We've completed the Bronze tier implementation with filesystem watcher and task processing. Now working on Silver tier with MCP integration. Looking forward to the demo!

emails.subject: Meeting Request: Silver Tier Review
emails.snippet: Could we schedule a meeting to review the Silver tier implementation? I have some questions about the MCP governance and the human-in-the-loop approval workflow. Would next Tuesday at 2pm work? Let me know your availability. Thanks!

emails.subject: [GitHub] Pull Request Review Requested
emails.snippet: You have been requested to review pull request #42: Add Gmail watcher with OAuth2 authentication. The PR includes perception-only email fetching, PII redaction, and checkpointing to avoid duplicate processing. Please review when you have a chance.
